name: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception — planting an idea into someone’s subconscious.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family’s future.

name: Money Heist
description: A group of robbers, led by the mysterious Professor, plan and execute the biggest heist in Spanish history.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical challenge when the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City.
